text:
e="preserve">Charles Leonard Levin (April 28, 1926 – November 19, 2020) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a Michigan Court of Appeals judge from 1966 to 1972 and as a justice of the Michigan Supreme Court from 1973 to 1996. He was born in Detroit, Michigan.
His cousin Carl Levin was a U.S. senator for Michigan from 1979 to 2015. His cousin Sander Levin was the U.S. congressman for Michigan's 9th congressional district from 1983 to 2019.
Levin died on November 19, 2020 in Detroit at the age of 94.
